subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: OAKLAND, Calif., July 26 (AP) — Frank Thomas emerged from his postgame workout, his green undershirt soaked through from a 30-minute ride on the stationary bike. The extra work has Thomas feeling healthy again, with his tender right quad muscle gaining strength daily.
